DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Skin Irritation , Phototoxicity Safety After Administration LEO 90105 Intact Skin Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male subject , Aged 20 40 year inclusive . Subjects without sign skin irritation ( erythema , dryness , roughness scaling ) test site . Subjects willing follow study procedure complete study Subjects understood sign write informed consent . Subjects without abnormal physiological test clinical test screening , also judge possible participant study investigator .
